title: CP9 REVEALED!! | One Piece Episode 243 & 244 REACTION

description: A reaction video covering episodes 243 and 244, focusing on the CP9 reveal. The reactor experiences the shocking moment when the masked agents unmask themselves.

title: One Piece Episode 243 UNCUT REACTION!
author: BOLDcast
description: An uncut reaction to One Piece Episode 243, featuring the shocking CP9 reveal and the betrayal of trusted Water 7 characters. Available to BOLDcast Patreon supporters.

title: 243: "CP9 Takes Off Their Masks! Their Shocking True Faces!"
author: neverwatchedonepiece
description: A blog post from someone watching One Piece for the first time, documenting their genuine reaction to the CP9 reveal in episode 243. The blogger notes: 'This was exactly the face I made when the CP9 Crew revealed themselves. I had no clue it was coming. None whatsoever.'

title: Episode 243 | One Piece Wiki | Fandom
author: One Piece Wiki contributors
description: Comprehensive wiki article about Episode 243, including plot summary, character appearances, debuts, trivia, and production information. The article covers the CP9 reveal, Rokushiki technique debuts, and the Pluton blueprints storyline.

title: One Piece: The Water 7 Saga is a Masterclass in Villains
author: Game Rant
description: An analytical article discussing how the Water 7 Saga, including the CP9 reveal in episode 243, demonstrates exceptional villain crafting. The article examines how the betrayal and reveal of CP9 creates compelling antagonists.
